模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.InteractableWorld

类 ItemFactory

java.lang.Object
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.SpecialItem.SpecialItemFactory
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.InteractableWorld.ItemFactory
public class ItemFactory extends SpecialItemFactory
ItemFactory is the concrete factory of SpecialItem Factory to create special items Inside its CreateItem method, the method would return corresponding type of special item according to String attribute 'type'

  • 方法详细资料

    • CreateItem

      public SpecialItem CreateItem​(String type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      Concrete method to create specific kind of special item
      指定者:
      CreateItem 在类中 SpecialItemFactory
      参数:
      type - the type of the special item
      world - the interactable world parameter
      colNum - the column number
      rowNum - the row number
      返回:
      the specific kind of special item based on the type
